candidates.why: Same group (issue); same discoveries storage family (.workflow/issues/discoveries); similar interaction (auto mode + multi-step exploration) and shares downstream viewing/export flows.
Prompt-driven issue generation; focuses on turning free-form text into structured issues, useful for output format and issue-candidate conventions.
Agent-based context gathering workflow; aligns with ACE-assisted exploration and session folder artifacts, useful for task decomposition patterns.
Transforms discovered issues into an implementation plan; complements this command's 'discover then plan' flow and artifact linking.
Canonical planning command in the same group; provides conventions for plan artifacts and subsequent execution workflows.

selected.why: Closest match in storage layout and end-to-end discovery lifecycle; best baseline to keep outputs compatible with CCW discovery routes and dashboards.
